hero.title: AI Receptionist for Your Thai Massage Business
hero.text: Never miss another booking. Your AI receptionist answers calls and messages instantly, even when you're with a client or closed for the day. Professional service, around the clock.

services.title: Every Call Answered, Every Message Handled

items.title: The Language Thing Stops Being a Problem
items.text: Your English might be good enough for everyday use, but it can be hard to talk to customers on the phone. Especially when they're asking a lot of questions or you're trying to explain something specific. The AI does all of that in perfect English. German, Italian, Spanish too if you need it. You run your business in Thai, and your customers get clear, professional messages.

items.title: You Stop Losing People
items.text: Every voicemail, every Facebook message that sits there for hours, and every "I'll reply later" that turns into "I forgot" is money that's leaving the business. Someone else may pick up the phone faster, but the AI always answers right away. Phone calls, texts, chats on websites, and social media. It doesn't matter if you're at home at 9 p.m. or in the middle of treatment with oil on your hands. Everything gets taken care of.

items.title: Way Cheaper Than Actual Staff
items.text: A real receptionist costs a fortune when you add it all up. Salary, taxes, holidays, sick days, the hassle of scheduling around their availability. The AI does the same job for a fraction of the price and never calls in sick. That money can stay in your pocket or go back into growing the business.

I used to lose bookings every day because I couldn’t answer the phone during a treatment. I hated hearing it ring while I was busy! Now the AI picks up my calls instantly and handles the customers for me. I’ve stopped missing calls completely.

features.title: Everything's Already in There
features.text: Handles calls, messages, and enquiries across every platform. Trained on your business, answers questions properly, and guides people toward booking. You don't have to be involved.

items.title: Every Call Answered
items.text: No voicemails piling up, busy signals, or a "sorry I missed you." Every call gets picked up in seconds. Even when you're busy, even after hours, even on your day off.

items.title: Messages Across All Platforms
items.text: Facebook, SMS, Google Business, website chat. The AI watches all of them at once. Instant replies, every time.

items.title: Guides People to Book
items.text: The AI answers their questions about treatments, pricing, availability, then points them to your booking system. Enquiries turn into actual appointments without you lifting a finger.

items.title: Sounds Like a Real Person
items.text: Natural conversation flow, clear answers, and a friendly tone. People don't realise they're talking to AI half the time.

items.title: Knows Your Business
items.text: We train it on everything. Your services, your prices, your policies, your location, your hours. When someone asks "do you do couples massages?" or "are you open Sundays?" it'll always know the answer.

items.title: Never Switches Off
items.text: Midnight on a Tuesday. Sunday morning. Christmas Day. Doesn't matter. The AI is there catching bookings your competitors miss because they went home at 5pm.
